title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
t interaction will go about with one of two ways, Mizora will either show up to help you or you will need to defeat her summoning and make it back to the dock.

Journal outcomes:

We located Grand Duke Ravengard, but Mizora has no intention of letting us save him. Per the terms of Mizora's bargain, Wyll traded his own freedom for the life of his father.

If Mizora decides to help:

Mizora was true to her word: she helped us lead Grand Duke Ravengard to safety. We should return to the submersible
